episodes.title: Buying Bottles, Hittin' Em With The Heezy and Oink Oink Shower Time: The Best of 2015
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Newtwork
episodes.summary:
With Charlamange busy being the hardest working man in show biz, Andrew Schulz is here to set the scene for all the Brilliant Idiots' greatest moments from 2015. Wax terrorizing roomates and boyfriends;  the birth of Young Heezy; Drake buying bottles for Charlamange; debates over white slavery with Desus and Mero and Oink Oink Shower Time. The high (and low) points of The Brilliant Idiots special blend of ratchetness and righteousness are all here for you to enjoy. 

And as you relive these moments, know that 2015 isn't quite over yet---we'll be back next week with all new Xmas edition. 

Until then....

After a visit from Wax, Charlamange and Schulz also speak on the murder of Chinx Drugs and why your mentality should be "Fuck The Hood." Finally, is the NFL the greatest reality show on the planet?

episodes.title: The Star Shame Enterprise Episode
episodes.author: Loud Speakers Newtwork
episodes.summary:
Welcome to the as yet untitled podcast from Charlamagne Tha God and Andrew Schulz. You've heard them talk their shit on radio, stage, and on various shows on MTV2 and MTV respectively now listen to their unfiltered, uncensored P.O.V on anything they want.

This week they talk about "Shaming" and are joined by writer @JasFly to discuss.
